SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P_NO ,STORE_NAME,SELLER_PAGE_NO, P_TITLE, P_PRICE, P_CHANGE_NAME, CAST(AVG(REVIEW.review_dibs) AS DECIMAL(10, 1)) AS AVERAGE_REVIEW_DIBS, COUNT(REVIEW.REPLY_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING(C_NO) JOIN SELLER_PAGE USING(SELLER_PAGE_NO) JOIN SELLER_INFO USING(BUSINESS_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW USING(P_NO) WHERE P_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY P_NO ,STORE_NAME,SELLER_PAGE_NO, P_TITLE, P_PRICE, P_CHANGE_NAME ORDER BY AVERAGE_REVIEW_DIBS ) LIMIT 10
